resources.string: Welcome to my student list app

On the home page, click "enter" to view the student list.

 On the student list page, click the plus sign on the upper right corner to add a student.

 On the student list page, tap on a student to view the details of a student.

 On the student list page, long press on a student to delete the student. 

 On the home page, click "summary" to view the summary statistics of the students.

 v1.0 by Polly Yim
